meta.job_title: Fire and Security Alarm Installation Technician

duties_responsibilities.duty: Servicing, programming, configuring, dismantling, reconstructing, converting, and trouble-shooting existing security and site automation solutions including fire and carbon monoxide detection, networking, hosted video solutions, and access control.
Exceeding customer expectations through system service and maintenance process and meeting customer commitments.
Arriving within estimated time of arrival and completing required processes of wired and wireless technology and connection procedures.
Testing and validating system signals/communication with central monitoring to properly establish service.
Demonstrating the operation and functionality of all provided services to the customer and identifying additional areas of opportunities for security and technology enhancements.
Assisting customer with security and technology enhancements by suggesting innovative and additional solutions to fulfill their security and site automation needs.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma (or equivalent) or one (1) year of industry experience
